items.subject: Invoice #CS-18420 due on 14 Dec
items.snippet: Your invoice is due tomorrow. Payment is required to avoid service interruption.
items.reason: Invoice due tomorrow with explicit warning that payment is required to avoid service interruption.
items.suggested_action: Process payment immediately to prevent service disruption.

items.subject: Action required: new device sign-in
items.snippet: We noticed a sign-in attempt from a new device. Confirm within 24 hours.
items.reason: Security alert requiring confirmation within 24 hours to verify account access or secure compromised account.
items.suggested_action: Confirm the sign-in attempt within 24 hours or secure your account immediately if unauthorized.

items.subject: Payment failed — update your card to keep access
items.snippet: Your latest payment failed. Update your card details to avoid losing access.
items.reason: Payment failure requiring immediate card update to prevent subscription service interruption.
items.suggested_action: Update card details immediately to maintain subscription access.

items.subject: Quick confirmation needed for the shipment slot
items.snippet: Can you confirm we can keep the 10:00–12:00 slot tomorrow? The carrier needs it today.
items.reason: Carrier requires confirmation today to lock in tomorrow's shipment slot, delaying risks losing the time slot.
items.suggested_action: Respond today confirming the 10:00-12:00 slot to secure the shipment time.

items.subject: Your itinerary — please review passenger details
items.snippet: Please check the spelling of passenger names. Corrections after today may incur fees.
items.reason: Itinerary review required today to avoid fees for corrections after deadline.
items.suggested_action: Check passenger name spelling in the attached itinerary today to avoid additional charges.

items.subject: Do you prefer option A or B for the landing page layout?
items.snippet: I can implement either layout — need your pick and any notes on copy.
items.reason: Requires decision between two layout options and feedback on copy tone without urgent deadline.
items.suggested_action: Choose preferred layout option and provide copy tone guidance when convenient.

items.subject: Can you send me the photos when you have a minute?
items.snippet: No rush — but I'd love the photos from last weekend.
items.reason: Request to send photos with explicit no rush indication, requires action but not urgent.
items.suggested_action: Send the photos from last weekend when convenient.

items.subject: We need additional info to close your ticket
items.snippet: Please reply with your address confirmation so we can close the ticket.
items.reason: Support ticket requires address confirmation to close, no urgent deadline indicated.
items.suggested_action: Reply confirming your installation address to close the support ticket.

items.subject: Re: Proposal — small clarification
items.snippet: Could you clarify whether the price includes implementation support?
items.reason: Question requiring clarification about pricing, quick yes/no answer requested without urgency.
items.suggested_action: Reply clarifying whether implementation support is included in the price.

items.subject: Can you share your feedback on the draft by end of week?
items.snippet: We're collecting feedback on the draft. Your notes would help us finalize.
items.reason: Feedback requested by end of week without immediate urgency or financial consequences.
items.suggested_action: Review the draft and provide feedback by end of week.

items.subject: Re: Meeting notes
items.snippet: Can you double-check the numbers in section 2? I'm not sure they're correct.
items.reason: Request to verify numbers in meeting notes attachment without immediate deadline.
items.suggested_action: Review section 2 numbers in the attached meeting notes and confirm accuracy.

items.subject: Password expires soon
items.snippet: Your password will expire in 2 days. Update it to avoid losing access.
items.reason: Password expires in 2 days requiring update, but not immediate urgency as there is a 2-day buffer.
items.suggested_action: Update password within the next 2 days to maintain account access.

items.subject: Draft contract attached — please review
items.snippet: Attached is the draft contract. Please review and send comments when ready.
items.reason: Draft contract attachment requires review and comments without immediate deadline.
items.suggested_action: Review the attached contract and provide feedback when ready.

items.subject: Offer details — please confirm by Monday
items.snippet: Please confirm acceptance by Monday so we can proceed with onboarding paperwork.
items.reason: Offer details PDF attachment requires review and confirmation by Monday for onboarding process.
items.suggested_action: Review the attached offer details and confirm acceptance by Monday.

items.subject: Tax form: please sign and return
items.snippet: Please sign the attached form and return it. We need it to process this month's payroll.
items.reason: Tax form attachment requiring signature and return for payroll processing this month.
items.suggested_action: Sign the attached tax form and return it to enable payroll processing.

items.subject: This week's updates: new features and tips
items.snippet: Here are the latest product updates and tips to get more value.
items.reason: Newsletter with product updates and tips, no action required.
items.suggested_action: Review updates for awareness, no response needed.

items.subject: Receipt for your payment
items.snippet: Thanks — here is the receipt for your recent payment.
items.reason: Receipt attachment for completed payment, no action required.
items.suggested_action: File the receipt for records, no response needed.

items.subject: Your package is out for delivery
items.snippet: Your package is out for delivery and should arrive today.
items.reason: Delivery status notification with tracking number, no action required.
items.suggested_action: Track package arrival, no response needed.

items.subject: Your ticket confirmation
items.snippet: Thanks for registering — your ticket is confirmed.
items.reason: Ticket confirmation with PDF attachment, registration complete, no action required.
items.suggested_action: Save the ticket for event attendance, no response needed.

items.subject: Scheduled maintenance tonight
items.snippet: There will be maintenance tonight. No action needed unless you experience issues tomorrow.
items.reason: Scheduled maintenance notification with explicit no action needed unless issues occur.
items.suggested_action: Note the maintenance window, no action required unless problems arise tomorrow.
